scripts.dev:backend:init: cd backend && if not exist .venv (python -m venv .venv) && .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip && .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install fastapi uvicorn[standard] httpx pydantic
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend:init && concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
